thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 04 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: N.Korea's ceremonial leader to visit S.Korea for Winter Olympics on Feb.9-11 -Seoul

author: Reuters Editorial
title: N.Korea's ceremonial leader to visit S.Korea for Winter Olympics on Feb.9-11 -Seoul
text:
SEOUL, Feb 5 (Reuters) - North Korea’s ceremonial leader Kim Yong Nam will visit South Korea this week as the head of the country’s high-level delegation for the Winter Olympics, Seoul’s Unification Ministry said on Sunday.
Kim, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People’s Assembly, will lead a 22-strong delegation expected to arrive in South Korea on Friday for a three-day trip, the ministry said in a statement.
The Games are scheduled to kick off on Friday and run through Feb. 25, during which Seoul hopes to hold high-level inter-Korean talks.
Kim is North Korea’s nominal head of state, while the country is ruled by Kim Jong Un, the third-generation hereditary leader. (Reporting by Hyonhee Shin; Editing by Adrian Croft)
